Publications

Working papers

  • Frech, Elena, Niels Goet, and Simon Hug. “Shirking and Slacking in Parliament”.

Under review

  • Goet, Niels and Ezequiel González-Ocantos. “The Impact of International Law on Constitutional Court Rulings: Evidence from Colombia, 1992-2015.”

Welcome to my personal website. I currently work as a data scientist at Inspera AS, an EdTech company based in Oslo, Norway. I use this website to blog about quantitative methods and programming, and to host sample code and data.
